lead_paragraph: Despite clear support on social networks for legalizing same-sex marriage in Ireland, opponents hope there is a silent, offline majority voting no.

headline.main: Online, Irish Referendum Looks One-Sided, but Conservatives Hope Vote Reveals a Silent Majority
headline.print_headline: Online, Irish Referendum Looks One-Sided, but Conservatives Hope Vote Reveals a Silent Majority

snippet: Despite clear support on social networks for legalizing same-sex marriage in Ireland, opponents hope there is a silent, offline majority voting no.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
